description.en: Not the most-wanted criminal. Wanted for excessive laziness, pushiness, bad humor, and low-quality content. Distinguishing features: balding, without neck, lives somewhere in Peru. His wife gives French lessons. If you do find him, we are sorry. A post-trauma hotline is available. No hay cuello y nunca lo hubo.
